description: Your central hub for connecting with the DSML Kazakhstan Community. Here you can fill out your profile card, join our private Telegram chat, find other community residents, and get early access to new features.
whatIsDashboardDescription: Your central hub for connecting with the DSML Kazakhstan Community. Here you can fill out your profile card, join our private Telegram chat, find other community residents, and get early access to new features.
quickStartDescription: How to join our Telegram chat?
step1Description: Create your professional profile card with your background, experience, and interests to connect with like-minded community members.
step2Description: Link your Telegram account to get access to our private community chat and exclusive discussions.
step3Description: After verification, you'll get access to our private discussion hub where the real conversations happen.
completeProfileForTelegram: Complete your profile first to connect Telegram
incompleteProfileMessage: Please complete all required fields to proceed
enjoyTelegramCommunity: After verification, you'll get access to our private community discussions
findCommunityMembers: Search and connect with other DSML Kazakhstan community members
signOutError: Failed to sign out. Please try again.
followStepsToJoin: Follow these steps to join our private community
followInviteLinkStep: Follow the invite link and enjoy
manageProfileSettings: Manage your profile information and settings
signingOutMessage: Please wait while we sign you out.
signOutErrorMessage: There was an error signing you out. Please try again.
